group_1.narration: I've had a natural talent for sports@and academics since I was very young.@So expectations on me were high.
While I was still at Daito, I took the@entrance exam for Mizuna Girls'@Academy and got a scholarship.
Everyone considered it a big accomplishment,@and even I was proud of myself.
But some girls at Mizuna didn't seem to@like me or where I came from.
I tried for two years to win them over@and make them change their minds,@and slowly they warmed up to me.
But just when I thought it was peaceful...
I learned that the girl whom I'd thought@of as my closest friend had been@deceiving me.
She tried to throw me down the stairs.
I managed to dodge by swinging around,@but I crashed into another girl behind me@and sent her falling down in my place.
And unfortunately that girl was known@as an even better student than me.
She was born and raised in Mizuna.
I don't really remember what@happened after that.
Before I knew it, a magazine and the school@paper had written that I did it on purpose.
The years of good faith I had built up were@dashed in an instant with this one incident.
Then the worst came.@I was advised to leave the school.
And so, still reeling from what had happened,@I returned to Daito Academy.

group_1.textLeft: Did you hear what happened with Mitama?@She came back after failing everything.

group_1.textRight: Ugh, and we had such high hopes for her.@That's such a blow for Daito's reputation.

group_1.textLeft: They say she shoved another girl.

group_1.textRight: What was she even thinking, going to a@school over on the west side?

group_1.textLeft: Maybe she's a traitor and switched sides?
Don't you have any shame? Being mocked like@that? Why'd you even come back?

group_1.textRight: It's all your fault our reputation is ruined@again.

group_1.narration: Traitor. We were all rooting for you.@You brought shame on us. You sold out.@You're why we're being ridiculed.@What a disgrace. Go home. Don't come near us.@She doesn't deserve a seat here.

group_1.textCenter: How could you say things like that?!
You were the ones who had all these@expectations of me when you sent me off!
Do you have any idea how hard I pushed@myself?!

group_1.textLeft: And this is how it ended up.

group_1.textRight: I feel bad for your little sister.

group_1.textCenter: She has nothing to do with this!

group_1.textLeft: WE might agree with you, but who knows@what other people might think?

group_1.textRight: There's no telling.

group_1.textCenter: You put someone up on a pedestal, and the@second they slip, you stab them in the back!
And now you're threatening my family?!
Enough! I can't stay silent anymore!
If you think of me as a disgrace...then I@guess I had better meet your expectations!
Let's start with shoving someone so hard@they fall and die. Any volunteers?!
Or if that's not enough, then...

group_1.textRight: Sh-she's got a fire extinguisher!

group_1.textLeft: How about I slam this into your skull?!

group_1.textRight: Cease that at once!

group_1.textLeft: Let go! Let GO of me!

group_1.textRight: I get that you've been through a great@deal of stress.
But don't let this break you.
Think of it as the ramblings of a mob.@You don't need to listen to them.
Don't disturb the peace here over such @pettiness!
Do you think this single incident of Mitama's@will decide the town's reputation?
Are you all lower than vermin?!
Do you have nothing of value to offer the @world?!
If you do, then don't assume that someone @else decides your worth!
Now, scram!
You handled things well, Mitama.
You were in an awful situation, but you held@your ground and came home.
Mm...
Welcome home, [chara:101601:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:101601:cheek_0][chara:101601:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json][chara:101601:lipSynch_1]Mitama.
